title: Mobile-Based Game Learning Design: Social Sector Practitioner Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: 15-20 minute modular learning via mobile devices, integrating game mechanics with social education content

learning_goals: Learners design social problem-solving simulation games to achieve 80% or higher learner engagement.
Learners analyze three or more types of learner performance data using game-based assessment tools.
Learners develop two or more mobile-optimized game-based learning scenarios.

resources: Game Development Tool (Unity/Unreal Engine Educational License)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
